kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
A few questions
1. How are new custom object types being created? ([custom application UI](https://docs.kentico.com/x/0wSiCQ), programmatically through [background services](https://docs.kentico.com/x/scheduled_tasks_xp), from visitors in website channels) 2. Have you considered making your validation rule more generic by adding [a validation rule properties class](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/customization/extend-the-administration-interface/ui-form-components/ui-form-component-validation-rules#validation-rule-back-end) which can target different fields for uniqueness?
